News.Title: Kaushalya Logistics Expands Network to 15 Depots Under CCFA Model
News.Summary: Kaushalya Logistics has expanded its network to a total of 15 depots under the CCFA (Carrying and Forwarding Agent) model. This expansion indicates growth in the company's distribution capabilities and potential market reach.

News.Title: Kaushalya Logistics Expands Network to Over 100 Depots Nationwide
News.Summary: Kaushalya Logistics has expanded its operations, surpassing 100 depots across India. This significant milestone indicates substantial growth in the company's logistics network and its ability to serve a wider geographical area.

News.Title: Kaushalya Logistics Expands Operations with New Depot for Adani Group
News.Summary: Kaushalya Logistics has expanded its footprint by establishing a new depot in Tohana for the Adani Group. This expansion is operating under the Carrying and Forwarding Agent (CFA) model. The company, with a market capitalization of 171 crore rupees, is classified as a Small and Medium Enterprise (SME).

News.Title: Kaushalya Logistics Expands Operations with New Depot for Adani Group
News.Summary: Kaushalya Logistics has expanded its operational footprint by establishing a new depot in Tohana for the Adani Group. This expansion is being implemented under the Carrying and Forwarding Agent (CFA) model, indicating a strategic partnership to enhance logistics services for Adani Group in the region.

News.Title: Kaushalya Logistics Expands Operations with New Depot for ACC and Ambuja Cement
News.Summary: Kaushalya Logistics has accelerated its growth by establishing a new depot to serve ACC and Ambuja Cement. This expansion indicates a strategic move to enhance the company's logistics capabilities and strengthen its partnership with major cement manufacturers.

News.Title: Kaushalya Logistics Expands Operations with New Depot in Darbhanga
News.Summary: Kaushalya Logistics has expanded its operations by opening a new depot in Darbhanga. This expansion signifies the company's growth strategy and efforts to enhance its logistics network.

News.Title: Kaushalya Logistics Expands Network with New Depot in Varanasi for Adani Cement Group
News.Summary: Kaushalya Logistics has strengthened its network by establishing a new depot in Varanasi, specifically for the Adani Cement Group. This expansion indicates a strategic move to enhance the company's logistics capabilities and service offerings for a major client in the cement industry. The company's market capitalization is reported to be 170 crore rupees.

News.Title: Kaushalya Logistics Expands Partnership with Adani Cement
News.Summary: Kaushalya Logistics has expanded its footprint by partnering with Adani Cement under the CCFA (Cement Carrier Franchise Agreement) model. This strategic move indicates a growth in the company's logistics operations and potentially strengthens its position in the cement transportation sector.

News.Title: Kaushalya Logistics Opens New Depot for Ambuja Cement in Haryana
News.Summary: Kaushalya Logistics has announced the opening of a new depot for Ambuja Cement, an Adani Group company, in Haryana. This development suggests an expansion of distribution capabilities for Ambuja Cement in the region. Kaushalya Logistics, with a market capitalization of 175 crore rupees, is likely facilitating this expansion as a logistics partner.

News.Title: Kaushalya Logistics Receives CFA Operation Approval from Adani Cement in Haryana
News.Summary: Kaushalya Logistics has obtained approval for Carrying and Forwarding Agent (CFA) operations from Adani Cement in the state of Haryana. This approval allows the company to act as a logistics partner for Adani Cement's distribution network in the region.

News.Title: Kaushalya Logistics Expands Cement Logistics Operations in Uttar Pradesh
News.Summary: Kaushalya Logistics is set to expand its cement logistics operations by establishing new depots for JK Cement in Uttar Pradesh. This expansion indicates a strategic move to strengthen the company's presence in the cement logistics sector within the state.

News.Title: Kaushalya Logistics Partners with Maersk Line for Surface Transportation in India
News.Summary: Kaushalya Logistics has entered into a partnership with Maersk Line to enhance surface transportation services in India. This collaboration aims to strengthen the logistics and transportation infrastructure within the country.

News.Title: Kaushalya Logistics Secures Agricultural Contract in Uttarakhand
News.Summary: Kaushalya Logistics has obtained a Full Truck Load (FTL) contract with Uttarakhand Seeds & Tarai Development Corporation, marking its expansion into agricultural logistics. This move signifies the company's growth and diversification into a new sector of the logistics industry.

News.Title: Kaushalya Logistics Expands FTL Segment with New Client
News.Summary: Kaushalya Logistics has expanded its Full Truck Load (FTL) segment by adding Bondada Engineering as a new client. This development suggests growth in the company's logistics operations and client base.
